  src/DLLMainInputDriverOIS.cpp
  src/gucefINPUT_OISJoystickListener.cpp
  src/gucefINPUT_OISKeyboardListener.cpp
  src/gucefINPUT_OISMouseListener.cpp
)

# Make sure the PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES variable is always defined

# Make sure the PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES variable is always defined
 set( PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES "" )

# For ease of use make a variable that has all files for this module
set( ALL_FILES ${HEADER_FILES} ${SOURCE_FILES} ${PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES} ${PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES} )




#******** END OF AUTOGENERATED CONTENT ********



add_library( inputdriverOIS ${ALL_FILES} )
add_dependencies( inputdriverOIS OIS gucefINPUT gucefCORE gucefMT )
target_link_libraries( inputdriverOIS OIS gucefINPUT gucefCORE gucefMT )
set_target_properties( inputdriverOIS PROPERTIES COMPILE_DEFINITIONS "INPUTDRIVEROIS_BUILD_MODULE;BUILD_GUCEF_INPUT_PLUGIN_DLL" )
GUCEF_config_plugin( inputdriverOIS )
